title: First Set of Interrogatories to Defendant
description: 25 interrogatories regarding the breach of contract allegations, timeline of events, and damages calculations.

title: First Request for Production of Documents
description: Request for all contracts, purchase orders, invoices, correspondence, and related documents.

title: Requests for Admission - Product Defect
description: Requests for admission regarding manufacturing process, quality control, and known defects.

title: Interrogatories - Manufacturing and Safety
description: Interrogatories regarding product design, testing, safety warnings, and prior incidents.

title: Employment Records Production Request
description: Request for personnel file, performance reviews, emails, and HR investigation records.
notes: Some documents produced under protective order

title: Interrogatories Regarding Termination Decision
description: Interrogatories about decision-making process, alleged discrimination, and company policies.

title: Medical Records and Hospital Policies
description: Request for complete medical records, surgical notes, hospital policies, and staff credentials.

title: Expert Witness Interrogatories
description: Interrogatories regarding defendant's expert witnesses, qualifications, and opinions.
